name: Hallucination (Mr.RedCoffee)
description:
There is a creature chasing you and you are losing your sanity constantly. Don't get caught or you gonna into madness.

The first thing you should do is open the drawers in the bedrooms to get the locker key.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Shift - Run

C/Ctrl - Crouch

LMB - Interact

Mouse Scroll - Change item

Game made for Supersensory Megamix '21

Warning: this game contain flashing lights.

I'm not a native speaker of english, so it may contain some translation issues, if you find some please let me know.
